content: शर्मन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शॄ-मनिन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 144</ls>] Happy, prosperous. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An affix added to the name of a Brāhmaṇa; as विष्णुशर्मन्; <ab>cf.</ab> वर्मन्, दास, गृप्त. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {1} Pleasure, happiness, delight; त्यजंत्यसून् शर्म च मानिनो वरं त्यजांति न त्वेकमयाचितं व्रतं <ls>N. 1. 50</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 69</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 97.</ls> {@--2@} A blessing. {@--3@} Protection. {@--4@} A house, receptacle (mostly Vedic in this sense).
